title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.29 - Availability of records and facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.29 - Availability of records and facilities

State Regulations

Each milk dealer shall make available at his office at
all reasonable hours to any employee designated by the commissioner all books, papers, records or documents relating to the purchase of milk from
producers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
40.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
